Occasions track special events like vacations, holidays, or projects
Accounts are created automatically when you import transactions
Click any item to see its transactions

Set budgets for any bucket, occasion, or account

transactions.title: Transactions Help
transactions.description: View, filter, and categorize all your imported transactions.
steps: Use filters to narrow down transactions by date, category, or amount
Click on a transaction to view details and edit
Use bulk actions to categorize multiple transactions at once
Toggle transfer visibility to focus on spending or see all movements
tips: Hold Shift while clicking a filter to exclude instead of include
Use the search bar to find transactions by merchant or description
Click column headers to sort transactions

budgets.title: Budgets Help
budgets.description: Set spending limits and track your progress against them.
steps: Click 'New Budget' to create a budget for a bucket, occasion, or account
Set monthly or yearly limits
Monitor the progress bar to see how much you've spent
Enable rollover to carry unused budget to the next period
tips: Budgets turn yellow at 80% and red at 100%
Click on a budget to see detailed spending breakdown

dashboard.title: Dashboard Help
dashboard.description: Get a quick overview of your financial health with customizable widgets.
steps: Use date range selector to view different time periods
Click 'Manage' to show/hide widgets
Drag widgets to reorder them
Create multiple dashboards for different views
tips: Click on chart elements to drill down into transactions
Anomalies highlight unusual spending patterns

import.title: Import Help
import.description: Import transactions from your bank's CSV, QIF, QFX, or OFX files.
steps: Download an export file from your bank's website
Select the file using the file picker below
Specify an account name to organize your data
Click 'Preview Import' to see what will be imported
Review the preview, then click 'Confirm Import' to save
tips: The system auto-detects your bank's file format
Duplicate transactions are automatically skipped
Create custom CSV formats in Tools > CSV Formats

admin.title: Admin Help
admin.description: Manage tags, view import history, and monitor system health.
steps: Use tabs to navigate between different admin sections
Create and organize tags for categorization
View import history and statistics
Monitor system health metrics
tips: Delete unused tags to keep your categories clean
Check the Health tab for performance metrics

tools.title: Tools Help
tools.description: Set up automation rules for categorizing transactions.
steps: Create category rules to auto-assign tags based on merchant or description
Set up merchant aliases to normalize messy bank names
Detect and link internal transfers
Save filters for quick access to common views
tips: Rules are applied in priority order
Test rules before applying to see which transactions match

organize.title: Organize Help
organize.description: View and manage your spending categories, special occasions, and accounts.
steps: Browse buckets to see spending by category
View occasions for special events like vacations or projects
See all accounts with their transaction counts
Click any item to view its transactions
tips: Create new tags in Admin > Tags
Set budgets for any bucket, occasion, or account

recurring.title: Recurring Help
recurring.description: Track subscriptions, bills, and recurring payments.
steps: Click 'Detect Patterns' to scan for recurring transactions
Review detected patterns and their confidence scores
Check 'Upcoming' tab for expected transactions
Monitor 'Missing' tab for overdue recurring payments
tips: Higher confidence scores mean more consistent patterns
Missing transactions may indicate cancelled subscriptions

reconcile.title: Reconcile Help
steps: Review each unreconciled transaction
Select transactions using the checkboxes
Click 'Mark as Reconciled' for verified transactions
Click 'Ignore' for duplicates or internal transfers
tips: Reconciled transactions appear normally in reports
You can change the status later on the Transactions page

tags.title: Tags Help
tags.description: Advanced tag management with full namespace control.
steps: Select a namespace on the left to view its tags
Click 'Add Value' to create a new tag
Edit or delete tags using the action buttons
Create custom namespaces for specialized categorization
tips: Tags in use cannot be deleted
Use the Admin page for simpler tag management

dashboardConfigure.title: Dashboard Configuration
dashboardConfigure.description: Customize which widgets appear on your dashboard.
steps: Toggle visibility to show or hide widgets
Use arrows to reorder widgets
Duplicate widgets for filtered views
Configure bucket filters for specific categories
tips: Create multiple dashboards for different views
Filtered widgets show only matching transactions
